mapper.sql: COUPON.ID COUPON_ID, COUPON.CODE COUPON_CODE, COUPON.TOTAL COUPON_TOTAL, COUPON.BALANCE COUPON_BALANCE, COUPON.ORIGIN COUPON_ORIGIN, COUPON.EXPIRY_TIME COUPON_EXPIRYTIME, COUPON.REMARK COUPON_REMARK, COUPON.USER_ID COUPON_USERID, COUPON.LAST_MODIFY_TIME COUPON_LASTMODIFYTIME, COUPON.CREATE_TIME COUPON_CREATETIME, COUPON.ENABLED COUPON_ENABLED, COUPON.DELETED COUPON_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into COUPON
CODE,
TOTAL,
BALANCE,
ORIGIN,
EXPIRY_TIME,
REMARK,
USER_ID,
LAST_MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
ENABLED,
DELETED,

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update COUPON
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EXPIRY_TIME = #{expiryTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from COUPON where DELETED = 0

SELECT
FROM COUPON WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and DELETED = 0
